li.label: moderate expectations
li.description: This place isn't quite rich. I can't expect to be totally pampered.

li.label: low expectations
li.description: This place doesn't have the wealth for many luxuries. I need to keep myself strong.

li.label: very low expectations
li.description: This place is poverty-stricken. I can't expect any comfort here; I need to keep myself strong.

li.label: extremely low expectations
li.description: I'm out here with little to no shelter. I'd better steel myself to survive.

li.label: in darkness
li.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.

li.label: cabin fever (mild)
li.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.

li.label: cabin fever (serious)
li.description: I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside!

li.label: wearing worn-out apparel
li.description: My outfit is looking pretty bad. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: wearing tattered apparel
li.description: I'm wearing a tattered piece of trash. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: sick
li.description: I don't feel very well, I'm sick.

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm uncomfortably cold.

li.label: very cold
li.description: I'm so cold. Shivering. Can't get warm.

li.label: freezing
li.description: My teeth are chatting so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.

li.label: hot
li.description: This heat is unpleasant. I'm sweating.

li.label: very hot
li.description: I'm really overheated.

li.label: extremely hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: burning up
li.description: I'm burning up. I think I could die from this heat!

li.label: a little bit crowded
li.description: It's a little bit crowded here.

li.label: crowded
li.description: This place is crowded. I would feel much better if there was more free space.

li.label: very crowded
li.description: This place is so crowded I can barely breathe. I need more space.
